caption.p: Brain MRI of the patient. (A) MRI revealed diffuse hyperintensities on fluid attenuated inversion recovery (FLAIR) imaging, accompanied by meningeal enhancement on the T1 contrast image. (B, C) Repeated MRI revealed that lesions were enlarged and meningeal enhancement was even more obvious after effective antibiotic therapy and induced labor. (D) Follow-up MRI showed marked improvement after corticosteroids treatment.
